Itemized Passive Description:
*As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn at the start of turn*
- Changes Ki Spheres: STR to AGL
*Per "Future Saga" Category ally on the team*
- ATK & DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 200%)
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 50%)
*Per "Future Saga" Category ally whose name includes
"Clone" on the team*
- DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 150%)
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 4%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 20%)
*When the team includes all five Extreme Types*
- ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
- All allies' ATK 30%{passiveImg:up_g} for 2 turns
*1 or more AGL Ki Spheres obtained*
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 20%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches 2 additional attacks, each of which has a
great chance of becoming a Super Attack

7716.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes supreme damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description:
50% chance of Super Attack transforming 
for supreme power!
